thread.title: Daniel Slabbert
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Daniel Slabbert

author: Daniel Slabbert
title: Daniel Slabbert
text: This is the first time I am using Prestige. The website is really easy to use and it took about 2 mins to complete my order. It's only 08/02/17 and the flowers are only arriving on Valentine's Day, but based on the easy to use website and the price, I'm rating them 4 stars because according to the reviews the flowers are good quality. So I might have to return later & adjust accordingly - if the flowers are excellent it will be 5 stars, if not, less
